name: Defiler of Instinct
oracle_text:
First strike

name: Yavimaya Sojourner
oracle_text: Domain — This spell costs {1} less to cast for each basic land type among lands you control.
flavor_text: To the long-lived treefolk, the Phyrexians invading again after only three centuries was as though they never left.

name: Smash to Dust
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Destroy target artifact.

• Smash to Dust deals 1 damage to each creature your opponents control.

name: Academy Wall

Defender

Kicker {G} (You may pay an additional {G} as you cast this spell.)
